alert.note: Alert for Benton; Jasper; Newton (Indiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Chicago (Northeastern Illinois and Northwestern Indiana)
info.headline: Wind Chill Warning issued January 14 at 11:15AM EST until January 14 at 1:00PM EST by NWS Chicago
info.description: ...WIND CHILL WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL NOON CST /1 PM EST/ TODAY... ...WIND CHILL ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL NOON CST /1 PM EST/ MONDAY... * WHAT...For the Wind Chill Warning, dangerously cold wind chills occurring. Wind chills as low as 35 below zero. For the Wind Chill Advisory, very cold wind chills expected. Wind chills as low as 30 below zero. * WHERE...Newton, Jasper and Benton Counties. * WHEN...For the Wind Chill Warning, until noon CST /1 PM EST/ today. For the Wind Chill Advisory, until noon CST /1 PM EST/ Monday. * IMPACTS...The cold wind chills could cause frostbite on exposed skin in as little as 15 to 30 minutes.
info.instruction: Avoid outside activities if possible. When outside, make sure you wear appropriate clothing, a hat, and gloves.
